Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30039186] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=3.12 μg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 1435 (MIC=1.56 μg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MRSA (MIC=3.12 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=6.25 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC10662 (MIC=50 μg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii clinical isolate (MIC=6.25 μg/ml);Fungi:Candida albicans clinical isolate (MIC=6.25 μg/ml), Candida tropicalis clinical isolate (MIC=6.25 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.30039186] 50% hemolysis at 87.5μg/ml,25% hemolysis at 50μg/ml,60% hemolysis at 100μg/ml against human red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria; antifungal activity.

Literature.Title: Identification and Characterization of Novel Antimicrobial Peptide from Hippocampus comes by In Silico and Experimental Studies
Literature.Author: Mohammadi M, Taheri B, Momenzadeh N, Salarinia R, Nabipour I, Farshadzadeh Z, Bargahi A.
